title: Assessment of the radionuclide remediation potential of novel miscanthus hybrids
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Vanja Jurišić, Davor Rašeta, Mislav Kontek, John Clifton-Brown, Luisa M. Trindade, Isabelle Lamy, Annie Guerin, Andreas Kiesel, Ana Matin, Tajana Krička, Branko Petrinec
